long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KSpark is a state-of-the-art AI platform that revolutionizes traditional interaction methods.

KSpark chrome extension is a part of the KSpark Education AI Assisant solution, offering a convenient and user-friendly cross-platform application for inputting and recognizing various types of digital content, such as math formulas, text, chemical expressions, shapes. Users can write or draw directly, eliminating the need for using complex coding or formula constructors.

With its intuitive interface, real-time recognition, and the ability to save and reuse inputs, KSpark chrome extension prioritizes ease of use, versatility, and efficiency, making the user's digital content creation experience seamless and study efforts more effective.
